segments.text: I see a woman diligently drying a plate at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her attention seems completely absorbed in that chore.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice the water overflowing from the sink, creating a small puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s surprising that she doesn't seem to notice the mess around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so serene, contrasting sharply with the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she realizes the potential danger of slipping on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus on the plate makes me think about how often we can be blind to our surroundings.
segments.speaker: PAR
